website_summaries.verdict: A highly versatile, quality-made cat castle that is well worth the extra investment. The best on the market.
pros: Suitable for aging cats, multiple cats, and heavier cats
cons: Highest levels are secured with plastic clips that may break

customer_reviews.title: Decent but definitely has some wobble to it.
customer_reviews.text: It is an ok cat tree. its not amazing by any means and it isn't terrible. The biggest knock is for its height they should have designed a bit more cross bracing and probably used a few metal plates for brackets on the baseboards. even if that increased the cost by around 10-15 bucks it would substantially make this a better cat tree. I could see this not lasting past a year if heavily used before it became worn out and just wobbled constantly. I spent about 10 bucks at walmart to buy some metal brackets and wood to reinforce it.
customer_reviews.author: jtown82

customer_reviews.title: Cat-topia...when she uses it lol
customer_reviews.text: I wanted my cat to have more options for cubbies and scratchie posts, so I opted for this. One of my friends had it and I figured what could go wrong, especially with this pricetag. It took me less than 30 minutes to assemble and I did it by myself. While my cat is needy and won't go on it without people around, she truely enjoys every bit of it when she does use it. Additionally, my little sister likes to hide underneath the levels? I guess it's good for more than just the cat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MY CAT LOVES IT!  My cat hates everything!!!
customer_reviews.text: She sleeps in it. Plays with the hanging mice, etc. Also easy to follow picture instructions that were laid out very well. Ikea should hire these guys to write their instructions sheets. You have to lay out the parts and watch what each part is labeled. It helps to have a small tape measure or a yard stick. Some of the rope covered poles are only different by a few inches but it's important. I had it together in less than 20 min. To be fair I have used tools all my life but if you take your time and read the diagram all will go smoothly! Thanks guys from me and my cat! Frank
customer_reviews.author: FRANK YANTOSCA

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: The item is a nice size, so far I have only had it for a week. Very easy to assemble; however, be noted that the platforms are compressed sawdust material. Therefore, not sure how durable in the long run. The fabric on the platforms is simple thin material, certainly will tear when a cat scratches it. As time goes by I will revamp this review, but in the short term seems like a good investment. However one of my cats prefers the box it came in; I kept it by the tree to amuse him. 🤔
customer_reviews.author: Lakegeorge12845

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: This cat tree is worth every penny. Very well made. This is my 2nd purchase as the first one finally gave out after over 5 years and one heavy cat pouncing on it. On the second one I used a good glue on everything as I put it together, so I'm expecting to get at least another 5 years or more out of it. It's large enough for a big cat to fit in the bottom house and the top tiers. Oh...and the blue is absolutely beautiful!
customer_reviews.author: Robin M. Padon

customer_reviews.title: It took forever to come. But my cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: Usually the cats take a few days to get used to new things. Not this tree we barely finished it before one was in it. A few minutes later both were sleeping. In it, one in a hutch the other on the top. . It was scary when I got a message that it was delayed in customs. But no customs agents arrived and it was delivered . This time of year I expect miracles in fast delivery. I suppose other people ordered stuff to.
customer_reviews.author: Not too old

customer_reviews.title: My cat and I love it. A fine value and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: I am happy with this product and consider it a fine value. I found it very easy to assemble. From moving the box upstairs to having it assembled was all of an hour. The tree itself is plenty stable considering the price and unlike other impulse buys of lesser scratcher furniture, my cat took to it immediately. Emma does not trust the highest pedestal, but lounges on all the rest of the levels as her favorite place to hang out now. As I have hoped she uses the rope columns for scratching saving on human furniture.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Shutt

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats of all sizes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been trying to get elevation for the kitties since I moved in. Couldn’t decide on shelves so I bought this in the mean time. I have 2 cats. One is young and fearless. He hangs from the sides, jumps from the top, everything. The other is a big guy, he’s overweight and very cautious about everything. I love this because even though he’s more to love he fits in all the areas. The ledges on the elevated flats help hold him in so he feels secure and only lets a fat roll or two hang over but he won’t fall. The cats are soo happy, worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Cat Approved!
customer_reviews.text: We looked at several cat trees and read a lot of reviews before we selected this particular item. We are very pleased with the purchase and the cats are enjoying it. We've got 4 cats, smaller to medium size. There have been a few times all four have been on it at once, and many times that 3 will be napping on the various platforms. It is holding up well to their play and I would anticipate that it will continue to do so for a few years. It does have a larger foot print than some other cat trees we considered, but it works well for our purposes. I would buy this again if the need arose.
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Nice cat tree, great price too!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd time I purchased this same exact cat tree. First time was in 2015, so you see it's lasted just short of 5 years- with 4 cats playing, scratching and napping on it, that's a pretty long time. Pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Joann D.

customer_reviews.title: My pets love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very active cat who loves to climb, and she loves this cat tree! She plays rough and will even take running leaps on to and off of the tree, and it doesn't tip or fall. I also have two ferrets who also like to climb on the tree, so it's good for more than just cats! I've had it for a few months now and it's holding up great, everything is intact and sturdy. I'm not handy at all, but was able to assemble the tree by myself without difficulty. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Daenerys Targaryen

customer_reviews.title: Well made for the price. Looks good and my cat loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Surprisingly well made for the price, but be careful with the three free standing posts at the top. They can flex and break with too much strain. You'll see it when you do the assembly. Other than that, it's pretty well built. My tiny, six pound female can get wild on it with no worry of it breaking. She watched the assembly and then cautiously checked it out. After a few days she was a pro at jumping from place to place on it. She loves this thing and spends a lot of time on it, playing and sleeping. This one seems to be money well spent.
customer_reviews.author: Tyge

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend! Perfect for large cats and cats needing a scratching post
customer_reviews.text: This is our second one of these. Great product, and you really can’t beat the price! Easy assembly, too. The last one we had for years. When we moved to a new place we got a new one just to have a fresh look, but the old one would have held up just fine. No complaints here! We have tried many smaller cat trees and scratching posts, and this is the ONLY one that our cats will use to scratch! They absolutely love it, and it’s just the right size to fit their fat butts.
customer_reviews.author: CMK

customer_reviews.title: Good for big cats
customer_reviews.text: Originally I was skeptical. I have a 15lb orange boy who loves space to stretch out, but he enjoys all the perches. He just barely fits in the smaller house, and only fits sitting on the top three pedestals, but it's big enough for him and he loves it!!! There is a strong scent of manufacturing/maybe glue when the box was first opened. It took a few days to dissipate and he had no interest in the tree until that happened, but after that he loved it. Easy to assemble, though you may need a stepstool if you're shorter.
customer_reviews.author: KiiCosplays

customer_reviews.title: Great Cat Tree/Climber
customer_reviews.text: I put this tree together by myself and found the instructions fairly easy to follow. It is very sturdy, and we haven't had any issues with in it's quality. I particularly like the two little "critters" that are pre-attached. They used an elastic cord and it's been fun for our kitten to play with since it pops away if he pulls it too far, which keeps him interested. He's tried out all the different levels as well. I think it's a good product and at a good price!
customer_reviews.author: NJC

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money great investment
customer_reviews.text: I recently brought home 2 kittens & wanted something for them to lay & play on this cat tower is amazing, it took me only 20 minutes to put together by myself. As soon as you open the box group column pieces together by size to save confusion also group screws together. All my pieces were there. Very sturdy. It took me a few days online to find the cat towers with the best reviews, I was concerned with having 2 cats about it being sturdy. I made a great choice. The blue is what I call a royal blue very deep color my kittens are darker haired is why I picked the color. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huge cat tree is attractive and cat proof
customer_reviews.text: I chose this cat tree because my cats clawed through the carpet-covered uprights of their previous tree in less than two years. This has ALL uprights covered in sturdy cord, which they claw but do not tear. It's huge, larger than I've ever had, which with my fur babies is a plus. Attractive too. The extra "houses"in the tree really please them. Value for the money: awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn A Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Cat-tastic!
customer_reviews.text: Love this-and so do my 3 cats! I read earlier reviews so decided to put his up when the cats were sleeping, lol. However, I did have my rabbit out at the time and he assisted me by giving it a test drive-got his approval as well! Anyone who knows rabbits knows that rabbit disapproval is something you do not want to ever witness, lol! Seriously though we are all happy with this cat tree-it is sturdy, was easy to assemble and is also attractive. Excellent price also! I've seen other smaller pieces that were more expensive, so I feel I made an intelligent purchase with this item-Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Marianna Bellantoni

customer_reviews.title: THE CATS MEOW
customer_reviews.text: I have had or I should say my cats have had similar trees in the past , I think they will agree this tree is (THE CATS MEOW) Shorty my male climbed into the lower birth during assembly feel asleep and is still sleeping an hour after it was completed.Sassy is a big girl @ 23lbs, she has been hanging out on the 2nd tier digging it whacking the toy around and contemplating her next move up . Sox is the quite type at almost 20lbs but she's been up to the third floor liking what she sees. Great product at a reasonable cost when compared to pet store prices
customer_reviews.author: Bikers56flh

customer_reviews.title: Great Condo
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son's cats. Unfortunately one past away abruptly. This condo has kept the remaining cat very occupied. It was obviously the cat was mourning his playmate. He loves this condo and jumps up and down and hides inside. It is well made and easy to assemble. I am sure my son will have second cat soon who will love to play in this as well. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: rjg

customer_reviews.title: Measurement not as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: For one thing, I love the cat tree. But things I dislike are, the base. Overall Size: 50"W x 26"L x 72"H very misleading. The true BASE measurement is 27"W x 23"L x 72"H. This was easy to assemble. The carpet is very cheap. The product is very usable. BUT is not as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Shawnie Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Tough As Nails
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a similar product about a year ago and watched my cats shred it in 2 months. The mouse came off the same day. After a few months we needed beer bottles in the rooms to hold it up. Last month we needed duck tape to hold up the pillars. I just wanted another so this destruction did not happen to my furniture. When this arrived I noticed the quality. The rooms were solid wood. After 1 week up and the abuse the mice have taken; they are still hanging. My cats love it. I am extremely happy with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Airy

customer_reviews.title: worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it. It's very tall and heavy. The weight makes it very sturdy. 70lvs? Ish. The instructions were shit and nothing was labeled but it was still easy to put together. I thought one of the pieces was broken because the screw was defective making one of the post not screw securely on but was able to fix it by forcing it a little. It takes a little elbow grease. It's big, and can't beat the price compared to petco/petsmart. Also, My cats weigh 6, 8, and 11 pounds. They all lay on each post fine, minus the 11 pound who hangs his legs off :)
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Love it but fat kitties struggle
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely ADORE this cat tower. My two 8 year olds haven't been this playful in years. They rarely embark upon the top post but that might come with time. It's very tall and the blue color is gorgeous. Only issue is that the steps don't really work. They're two vertical and they move so they're mainly an aesthetic. I think I need to buy a step stool because my fat old man in the picture has a hard time getting up there.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great  for cats and the health and care for them they will be happy to have this cat tree.
customer_reviews.text: I love this cat tree it was the best thing that we got for my cats in awhile. It is so loved by my cats and it make us feel better to see them having so much fun on it. Great buy for people with cats they will thank you for getting it for them in so many ways. Hope this helps you and your cats.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer satisfaction

customer_reviews.title: ... the box was opened but the actual product is great. My kittens have decided to live in the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a little bit wobblier then I expected and there were bits of pieces of material everywhere when the box was opened but the actual product is great. My kittens have decided to live in the top house. We store all their toys in the bottom one and they hang out on the top for quick afternoon naps and those mice are also all the rage. I don't know how they are still attached. Great Cat Tree!
customer_reviews.author: James W.

customer_reviews.title: Kind of shakes around, but still good
customer_reviews.text: It's not as sturdy as I was hoping it would be, but my cat gets hyper and runs up and down it, sleeps at the very top perches, and sometimes jumps to pull himself up to the top by the scratching posts. After a month of that, everything is still held together and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: C. Vigil

customer_reviews.title: This is easy to put together and the cats love it
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to put together and the cats love it. Right now I have two kittens, so I can't comment on the stability with full size cats running around on it. I like that the material is plush instead of carpet, as this helps the cats learn that there are some fabrics they can scratch and some they cannot. I did not install the bottom ramp because it sticks out to far, but the cats can still get up fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rik

customer_reviews.title: New purchase
customer_reviews.text: I just received my new cat tree...was impressed with the packaging, square box with wood stacked on top of each other, scratching posts inside condos, very compact and easy to remove parts, everything neatly packaged. Very clear, easy directions....followed diagrams and had it put together in 45 minutes, none of your own tools needed. My cats were all over it half-way through the assembly. They absolutely love the finished product! My 18 pound orange tabby even sits on the top perch. The only thing I was disappointed in was the toys on the strings....the string broke immediately within 2 minutes of the cats playing with them. Other than that, I would recommended this product highly. Good deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Solid cat tower, poor packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Took off 2 points for condition of packaging upon arrival, plus interior bag ripped open causing contents to need a major vacuuming, and no instructions. However all the pieces were there and I found the instructions online so I could get it assembled without too much headache. Kitten approval TBD. Otherwise seems sturdy and has decent materials. (Side note: kitten's build-it-yourself swedish doll bed next to tower not included.)
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how little this cat tree costs opposed to ones in-store. This thing is huge and my cats LOVE napping on it or just chilling and watching fun things outside the window. Love it! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Turner

customer_reviews.title: Its like an 80 lb box you get with everything inside
customer_reviews.text: Its ok. There is NO PACKING MATERIAL INSIDE!!!! Its like an 80 lb box you get with everything inside. The setup was simple. My cat has destroyed the bottom leg white wrap in a few months. The stand stink too...LIKE INDUSTRIAL STRENGTH GLUE. I had two other friends help me move it outside bc I knew my cat wouldnt go anywhere near it at first. This thing is over $100 when I bought it and I next time, for $30, I'll build my own. Its flimsy, especially towards the top. The "STAIRS" are useless as any cat will just jump top to the next levels. The blue carpet is cheap and non-padded.
customer_reviews.author: Hondais1

customer_reviews.title: Bought one of these and the quality was good and the cats utilized it a lot so ended ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought one of these and the quality was good and the cats utilized it a lot so ended up buying a second one (we have 4 cats). Sturdy and a nice change to a look in the blue instead of the cream that so many of them are. Simple assembly and can be done by a single person if you can do a little balancing (to get the base started) - but the beginning of the assembly would be a little easier having a holder-helper for just a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Moritz

customer_reviews.title: Good construction and design. Happy cat = happy humans
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality platforms and very easy to assemble. I added a fastener to the upper cat cave to reduce wobble. Poles are all sisal rope wrapped, very resistant to scratching. Fake fur wrapping decent, not rug. We got the blue which is a good color. We use a coat lint brush not vacuum. Works great. Great design. Ramps will come in handy as our 1 year young ages into senior years. Looks OK in living room by window. High pedestals good size.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair of these, one for downstairs and one for upstairs. Our 4 cats seem to love them. Places to climb and places to hide. Easy to replace worn components. Saves the furniture!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew K.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: My fault, but the cat tree didn’t *look* that tall in the picture. It was easy for two people to assemble, but one could also do it. I have it in front of the big picture window and it works very well. My kitty loves it, especially the top platform. Definitely room for more than one occupant! Hmm. Perhaps a new roommate?? Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: suzew

customer_reviews.title: My cats love to play on it and sleep in their little ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge cat tree/condo. My cats love to play on it and sleep in their little houses. My wife and I have 6 cats (I know, wow, that's a lot) and there's room for all of them on this thing. And as much real estate as there is on this cat tree, it takes up a surprisingly small footprint in the house. Great buy for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Joey C.

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for the exact same model, in a lighter color, that my cats loved to death. The first one lasted over 4 years of them sharpening their claws on it instead of my furniture so it seems like a good value.
customer_reviews.author: M Spurling

customer_reviews.title: I thought that this one looked good but all it has covering the particle board is ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had cats all my life and I know how they treat a cat tree. I thought that this one looked good but all it has covering the particle board is furry cloth not carpet. The cloth comes off the particle board and the posted on the top come out of their places which makes the tree dangerous for my cats. I am glad I kept my real cat tree bc they play on that one exclusively. It has carpet and is much sturdier. I would not reccomend this to anyone
customer_reviews.author: grandbeauch

customer_reviews.title: Love it and it matches my couch!
customer_reviews.text: Tad bit wobbly but my cat got used to it after a months She's all over the thing now! She didn't care much for it at first now she scratches and crawls all over it! It helps to sprinkle a little cat bip on it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: A good buy
customer_reviews.text: Took me awhile to set it up considering the parts weren't labeled like the directions said it was but I got it put up and my kitten loves it. It's a little wobbly and as my kitten gets older I can see it needing more support so I may have to stabilize the base or attach part of it to the wall. Love the color, blends well with my decor as it doesn't stand out like most cat trees do. I've had it for awhile now and everything is still intact
customer_reviews.author: Prince

customer_reviews.title: Stable and large enough for 3 big kitties! (not too big for the room though)
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 rather large fat kitties and this is stable enough for them to jump up on and it doesn't wobble at all! Love it. The blue is great also. Love that we found one in a color other than tan or black. The cubbies have solid walls instead of fabric on a frame and the "nap spots' are big enough for the biggest cat. We will definitely look into this brand when we get ready for another smaller one for a different room!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Good looking product that stands up to heavy use.
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy enough overall. I wish it was just a touch sturdier, but it has stood up to our three cats --including a 25 lb monster. The steps are held in by one screw. This leads to them getting knocked loose on a regular basis unless you add a second screw or secure the bottom somehow. Other than that, it's fine. The cats love it and that the important thing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My kittens have been using this for a few months now, it's very sturdy and well made especially since kittens like to run and jump, I really like that the platforms are all one piece which really keeps it stable. The carpet on it is plush and easy to vacuum. My kittens really love it. I would indeed recommend this to anyone looking for a cat tree.
customer_reviews.author: Kim P

customer_reviews.title: Height of this tree is a must for cats who love being up high.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice lightweight tree. They sit on this multi level tree by the window the majority of the day wiggling their tails, dreaming of being mighty hunters to the birds at the bird feeder. They are so content; they have been known to squabble over who gets the throne seat.
customer_reviews.author: seaside77

customer_reviews.title: Cat and kids both love it.
customer_reviews.text: My family has four cats and all four of them like this cat tree. My daughter likes it too. It seems very solid and was so easy to assemble. I have no mechanical ability and this took no tools and less than twenty minute to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Bob N.

customer_reviews.title: Great cat tree
customer_reviews.text: Great cat tree! Our cats are obsessed with it. Unfortunately the mice did not last long (maybe 5 minutes, tops) as they are very flimsily attached and came right off as soon as the cats got at them, but we have just tied different things to it with string and that works pretty well. The color is nice, not the usual beige on beige on beige. The tree was fairly easy to put together, though I do recommend doing it with two people as it helps to have someone to help hold things in place.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Jung

customer_reviews.title: Can take a Beating!
customer_reviews.text: Had this for 6 months now with 6 cats and it still looks almost as good as the day I purchased it. Believe me, it has seen heavy usage! The base is wide and strong and this thing can take a beating! They play and sleep and scratch on it all day long. Small pricetag, too. Update: Bought this tree almost 4 years ago and still going strong! All 6 still use it daily, still looks good, comes clean and is so much more rugged than any cat tree I've ever purchased. Quality product! 2nd Update: Just bought my second one :)
customer_reviews.author: IvanaYvonne

customer_reviews.title: Not too shabby!
customer_reviews.text: Been a hot minute since I ordered this, and so far so good! My four cats are happy to report it does them well. It's fairly sturdy, though it can wobble just a bit. Otherwise, it seems perfectly suitable for four active adult kitties!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: 3 out of 3 cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy! Went together easy, no problems. The cats were laying around me watching me build their new Condo on Christmas night. They could not wait for it to be finished and started climbing on it and walking thru it before it was finished. They like playing with the dangling mice as well. Recommended by 3 out of 3 cats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy construction.
customer_reviews.text: The posts that hole up the platforms on the top are pretty flimsy. The are just supported by a bolt set into a plastic base. I am afraid that they will eventually break when one of out cats just up on them as they wobble alot. I have tightened them to the point that I am afraid of breaking something and they still wobble.Other than those the rest of the tree is sturdy and decent.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: The best of Cat Tree
customer_reviews.text: My kitties love this new cat tree, and it's heavy which, provides support when they jump on it. They love to get on the top self and hide inside the boxes... I put it next to a huge window so they have lot's to see once they decide where they're going to sit. It's my second large cat tree...the other one I bought at a pet supply store but I had to put a heavy sculptor in the middle of the bottom shelf on the floor floor to keep it from topping over..... This one is perfect, beautiful color...we are all very pleased to have it a part of our home...thank you Amazon!! I would highly recommend this cat tree...
customer_reviews.author: Bara Haynes

customer_reviews.title: Needs thicker rope
customer_reviews.text: I have a 15# snowshoe Siamese. The product was very easy to assemble however once together some pieces (steps & platforms) tend to move a lot. The rope is very thin and since purchase he has already gone through 2 columns and is now ripping apart the cardboard underlay.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Bridges

customer_reviews.title: Cats MEOW!
customer_reviews.text: I received the item early nice surprise. My new cat needed a high cat tree. It was so easy to install,but took longer since Kitty had to try each level as I went up. Lol I placed it right in front of the window and she just loves the height. It's very stable, the faux velvet is not the best quality, but I can live with it for the amazing price point.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 2 and both had missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cat tree about 2 years ago. I have 3 cats and they absolutely loved it! 2 are normal size and 1 is a pretty hefty cat and it held all of them well. They all jumped on and off of it and it held up great. I recently ordered 2 more for my new place and both boxes had missing pieces in it. To avoid going through the trouble of sending both back for missing pieces I took apart my old one and used those pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made and kittens love it
customer_reviews.text: the only gripe I have about this is that the instruction show the parts as labels a,b,c etc .. however none of the pieces have the correspoding labelling. Not hard to figure out what goes where, but looked all over for some form of identification of the pieces :)
customer_reviews.author: Marj SB

customer_reviews.title: They love their new toy.
customer_reviews.text: The pictures speak for themselves. My two babies love their new jungle gym. It was easy to put together, it’s sturdy & they climb, sleep & jump on it daily. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: glenda

customer_reviews.title: They love it! so I read most all the reviews, before buying.
customer_reviews.text: The blue fur covering does show light colored hair, as u would expect. But if ur like me sometimes don't think of that stuff before buying. The directions were easy...... I did it alone in no time. It does have a smell. But the next day it had died down. There is one thing that I do not like and it is the smallest house and the small space between it and the pole. It just WORRIED me that the little one might get stuck. I opted to leave the walking boards off. For the money thousands great buy. It does sway a bit when the rough house. But pushed against the wall that stopped it. We all love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kiwi

customer_reviews.title: The cats just love it - it needs a good corner space
customer_reviews.text: The cats that got this for Christmas are loving it, they especially appreciate the fact that they can be really high up and look on the home's activities from high above, easy to put together, took about 30 minutes for one person, it is sturdy and the cats love the go inside little homes and look out the other side as well....if it can be put near lower and higher windows the cats will spend quite some time on it, exploring and watching the world around them inside and out.... If I remember right it came in two colors beige and white and this blue and white.... Edith YourChicagoConnection
customer_reviews.author: Edith George Jasser

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. I had the tan one of these that lasted for over three years. Bought the blue one after the tan one broke in a move. Now I have had the blue one less than 3 months. Of course the return window has closed. It is falling apart. Normal use from my cats has broken it in two places. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 senior kitties, my two boys (16 and 11) LOVE this. My 11 year old always sleeps on top of the towers while my 16 year old loves the bottom box, I put a bed inside it for him and he never leaves. They love that the columns are scratching posts. Best purchase I made for them. I was so hesitant because I was unsure if they would actually like it, but they're so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Jasinski

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but shaky
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this thing! I like how tall it is, I can tell my cat feels more secure now that she has a high enough perch to see almost the rest of the house. My only gripes are that the whole thing shakes quite a bit when she jumps up on it. There was also a cracked platform in my box. It will still support her weight but I was lucky that it was one of the topmost platforms and not one of the lower, more weight-bearing ones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but good luck so far
customer_reviews.text: Not as stable as I thought it was going to be. Seems to be holding my cats well, I have 2 that are 12-14 lbs and one that is 20-22 lbs. It wiggles a bit but has never shown signs of tipping over. Other reviews talked about the higher pedestals break off, we are ready to reinforce it if need be, but good luck so far.
customer_reviews.author: EStinson

customer_reviews.title: Give your cat / cats a good week to adjust to it.
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy cat tree that went together easily. Initially my two cats, one large adult and one 6month old kitten, ignored the cat tree, but within a week they were checking it out, and by the time a month passed it was/is their favorite play gym :-) I’m so happy since they are spending way less time on the furniture AND they’re using the posts for scratching! Yay! Product carpet does shed but vacuums up easy, and now the majority of cat hair is contained on the cat tree carpet rather than my furniture. Yay! Well worth it!!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M.

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: I have two active cats and they love it. They sleep on it every night and run up and down it all day. It does wobble but I think that makes it funner for them smh
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: We have a cat who is always up on things as cats will do & we knew we needed to get him something like this. You can not beat the price and he enjoys getting up on it...sometimes just to look outside, and other times to sleep. When we are playing with him, we sometimes put things in the little cubbies & he goes loves this "game" of trying to get to them!! The only complaint I have is that it does wobble just a tiny bit when he jumps up on it, but it doesn't seem to bother our cat at all. It arrived promptly, in great condition, and was easy to assemble. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl G.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My 3 cats love it and it lasted a long time had for about 2 years, the rope started to untangle but other then that it’s beautiful. It’s not easy to keep clean but looks great
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: I have a 10 pound cat and this thing wobbles like crazy every time he gets on it
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cheap cat tree. I have a 10 pound cat and this thing wobbles like crazy every time he gets on it. I would recommend going to a store like Petco and pay the extra money to get a much sturdier cat tree. In my opinion this particular cat tree should only cost around $50 to $60 based on how flimsy it is. Wood is thin. Carpet doesn't cover interior of hiding holes. The fluffy animals are just stapled to the underside of the frame so you cannot change them out once they get too torn up. This is just an ok product. Not great and definitely not worth $115.
customer_reviews.author: Brett M. Van Fleet

customer_reviews.title: Kitten breaks off mice day one.
customer_reviews.text: Not the best durability. Kitten (yes kitten) broke off both of the hanging mice the first day. Disappointed. Dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mendes

customer_reviews.title: 5 cats climb on it and love it. So easy to vaccuum hair off
customer_reviews.text: Have had this cat tree for over a year. Took about an hour to put together. I lined up all the parts on the floor before I began. 5 cats climb on it and love it. So easy to vaccuum hair off. only drawback is the plastic that holds the columns up is cheap and cracks. One tower on the top has cracked off. Just a little more effort, and I think company could solve this problem. I have a huge Maine Coon which climbs on it and I worry the next tower will topple with him on it. Very tall, and the cats love each part of it.
customer_reviews.author: rocketdog24

customer_reviews.title: Best Cat Tree!
customer_reviews.text: I love this cat tree. It's huge. Perfect for multiple cats. I have 4 grown cats and they all love this and use it. I was worried it wouldn't be big enough but it's way bigger than I thought it'd be! And it's pretty durable and sturdy. They don't really use the ladders because they're kind of narrow and not easy to grab onto but they love the little mouse toys that come attached. If you have one cat, I personally think it's too big and costly but if you have multiple cats it's a great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Aidubbz

customer_reviews.title: Go Pet Club Cat Tree, 50W x 26L x 72H, Blue
customer_reviews.text: Always a little wary on things that are normally sturdy but have been made for the do it yourselfers lol. This house is surprisingly sturdy and the cats love the little hanging mice. They don't use the house on the lower level but that's only because the dogs can reach it. They sleep in the top level house and the two lower platforms. I have food dishes on the top level and a very small water dispenser wedged sideways between the house and the pole to the lower right platform. The set up works great and the dogs can no longer reach their food dishes.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfs-bane

customer_reviews.title: Beastly tree
customer_reviews.text: I've got two very active 6 year old, 16lbs cats that have busted up four 4' tall trees. This behemoth is worth every penny. It'll handle big cats and gives them ample area to play around and sleep in comfort. despite the height it has a surprisingly small footprint in a room. only a few minor remarks: slightly tricky to build by yourself possible but far easier with help. two jingly mice are hung on cheap elastics underneath some parts of the tree, i can't remember where since my cats tore them off with little effort before I could build the upper sections.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Nova

customer_reviews.title: I'd Buy it Again
customer_reviews.text: Overall we (me & the cat) are very happy. I think that its a bit expensive for particle board, sisal & carpet remnants but I did my research and this is the best option I could find. I agree with other reviewers in that it is a tad flimsy and the cubes are quite small, but I've seen cats fit in to smaller spaces. The dangling mice were ripped off easily and I was disappointed by that. Otherwise, it was easy to put together ( a huge plus for me), the color is nice, the carpet is very soft and plush, and it took a while, but my kitty now loves to sleep in the highest basket.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it. But we have to tighten all the bolts that hold up the platforms almost everyday. It's such a hassle. And the hanging toys lasted less than a week before they fell off. Poorly made in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Shaun

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it assembled and the cat LOVES this thing. The material is super soft and the tower is super easy to assemble (took me 10 minutes). Some drawbacks: The wood is particle board so it probably wont last for many years. Also, after assembling, the tower is relatively wobbly. I put mine against a wall and its totally fine. But if you plan on leaving it in the center of a room (it would look weird IMO) it may be a little too flimsy. Overall, it was worth the price and it looks very nice in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: john libby

customer_reviews.title: It could easily accommodate 3-4 cats
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! It could easily accommodate 3-4 cats, and our only cat loves it too! The blue is perfect, and goes with our living room. My only complaint, and the reason for 4 vs 5 stars, is that it's particle board and plastic. I wish it was made of a more sturdy wood(real wood), rather than particle board. I'd have gladly paid an extra $100 for real wood in place of the particle board pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Rowan

customer_reviews.title: HUGE, loads of space for the cats
customer_reviews.text: IT IS HUGE! I MEAN REALLY HUGE! T cats will lo e it loads of space. Just make sure you have roo. for it
customer_reviews.author: Diana Carter

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! STILL GREAT AFTER 7 MONTHS!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this 7 months ago. It was shipped fast. Easy to put together. I have one cat who is now about 9 months old. He LOVES it. The only issue is he pulled the mice off (that dangle) pretty quickly (within a few weeks). I kinda figured that would happen. Its well made, still looks pretty new (and he plays on it all the time). I even moved a month ago and had to disassemble and re-assemble it (which was relatively easy). Still in great condition. OH! I LOVE the color of the blue carpeting used on it. I highly recommend this purchase to any cat lover :)
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Stapleton

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Reviewed after 1 year of use
customer_reviews.text: My cat weighs around 12 lbs and uses this tree as his perch, scratching post, and bed for most of every day. It has some obvious wear and tear, but the tree itself is stable and a great product.
customer_reviews.author: College student #1337

customer_reviews.title: Kittens Thor and Loki Approve!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this cat tree! It's huge! My two cats love it! The reason for four stars is the stairs pieces are a little flimsy. They don't sit on the cat tree like they should but that's only minor. Also the little mouse on the tree was ripped off within minutes of putting it together. It should come with a couple extra mice. Putting it together was a piece of cake!
customer_reviews.author: Doc Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & the cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 15-20lbs cats, they love it and its sturdy enough to support both of them to do their acrobatics.... Just be sure to tighten everything properly... I have owned one of these before and it will last a good 3-5 years (my cats don't tear up the padding.. so mileage may very depending on your cat).
customer_reviews.author: Cyrus

customer_reviews.title: A little banged up but still good
customer_reviews.text: I bought my cat tree used but took the sign of it being “like new” for everything to be in better condition. While some of the platform were broken in places, debris was left over from the previous owner, the cat tree is very sturdy and quite tall. My cats enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid structure and great quality rope.
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this! It has good quality rope and soft blue covering. Vacuums easily. It’s also very sturdy as my 16 lb cat and 8 lb cat chase each other all the way to the top. The 16 lb cat spills over the edge a bit on the top tier, but loves sleeping there. Extremely pleased and would definitely buy again for myself and/ or a gift.
customer_reviews.author: ChrysD

customer_reviews.title: My usually lethargic Sphynx loves this thing
customer_reviews.text: Getting my cat to do more than cuddle with me has been a challenge. I love my time with her and would love it more if she showed any interest in playing and getting much needed exercise. She is constantly up and down this thing. She doesn't use the ramps and, predictably, barely pays attention to the mice but the different platforms are great for her. It's very sturdy, and very easy to put together. I would actually recommend it for a multiple cat home more than a single one like mine. I underestimated the size of it.
customer_reviews.author: Makoto Ichijoji

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: I was shocked at how sturdy this was, considering the price! Pleasantly surprised and my cats LOVE it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Nunnery

customer_reviews.title: Great product, lasts long time
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one. The first one was just over 10 years old. I move it to the back room and got the cats a brand new one exactly like it because they love it so much. I have it next to the glass sliding door so they can sit in the perches and look out.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tower
customer_reviews.text: My two cats love this tower the romp on it so much the end up moving it almost to middle of the room. And one of my cats only has three legs and has no problem with it. Only thing the toys hang not where cats can really play with them
customer_reviews.author: Sarah F.

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this!!
customer_reviews.text: We have two cats who love this. The only complaint I have is the the brackets that hold the ramps between the levels don't tighten to the point where the ramps don't move. Because of this the ramps can move side to side when the cats play together on it and the brackets bend. They are still attached and unbroken, for now, but I wouldn't be surprised if they broke soon. That being said, cats don't need the ramps, obviously so even if they do eventually break it's still wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this, the price is great and it is ...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Go Pet Club Cat Tree, same design just a different color this time. The first one lasted over 5 years with three large cats. I would recommend this, the price is great and it is easy to assemble. It is not made with 4x4 wood posts, the poles are heavy duty cardboard tubes wrapped with rope for scratching.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret in cal

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a great tree.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it last week and it's pretty solid. I have 6 cats and one is about 13 lbs and it doesn't budge when she jumps on it. This is the second one I've owned and the first one held up for about a year.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Cribb

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have three cat's one that's 10 lbs, a 14 lb and 15 lb cat. They ALL love it and fit on it comfortably. I will definitely buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: My 3 cats are all over it
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty good, but the stairs keep moving and the tiers seem to loosen a bit. The cats love to climb on it though. They love to scratch the scratching posts as well. They pulled off the hanging toys in the first five minutes of setting this thing up. I did not personally set it up, my boyfriend did, but it did not seem too difficult to set up. The cats barely use the lower levels as they like to be up high. They use the houses occasionally. This provides fun for them and for me to watch them.
customer_reviews.author: kp

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: My cats love it 3 stay on it pretty much all day it was easy to assemble it's huge
customer_reviews.author: lisa berry

customer_reviews.title: Great cat tree for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This cat tree is great for the price. The size is prefect for both my average sized cats to climb, play, and sleep on at the same time. The tree was easy to assemble, took about 25 min. Would have been nice if it was a little heavier duty, but for the price I'm still happy. My only complaint is that due to poor packing one of the corners on the middle platform was slightly damaged, but with a little wood glue should be fairly easy to fix. Overall I'm very happy with the tree, and so are the cats.
customer_reviews.author: c. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT  CAT TREE ÷)
customer_reviews.text: Cat tree is more then I expected. Love it. It was not difficult assembling it together. It comes with a little tool to put it all together. No hassles what so ever. Plus I got this less then the original price because supposedly the package was damaged. I didn't see no problem at all. I've seen these cat tree's at the stores and they are way more expensive. This is way bigger and way worth the price. It's well built. I was afraid to purchase this product. It is by far an excellent cat tree.
customer_reviews.author: annabel

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product! =^..^=
customer_reviews.text: The shipping box was very sturdy and weight almost 70 lbs. It made it to our house in excellent condition. You will need 2 people to move it. The cat tree materials used are very nicely manufactured and were very easy to assemble. It took me and my husband about 1/2 hour to put together and only had to rethink a couple of screws and directions *snicker*. We have only had it for four days and Aries, our new male kitten, is loving the attached mice and gradually exploring the different levels, but our eldest, Saphy, who is almost 17 years, is not so sure about it ..yet?. I would definately recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Vivid

customer_reviews.title: cat tree
customer_reviews.text: Just arrived yesterday, assembly was pretty quick and really easy. Seems nice and sturdy so far. My kitties love it! They've been flying up and down it all day and they love the rope covered posts. However, they had both of the dangling toys pulled off in less than an hour and the ramps are installed with only a single small bracket so they wobble some when the kitties get frisky. They are only 4 months old now so I hope it can keep up with them when they are full grown. All in all, happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: kt0904

customer_reviews.title: Good tree, but super thin carpet
customer_reviews.text: This tree is a very nice size, my cats especially love sitting on the top 3 platforms (they mostly ignore the bottom two). One thing I don't like so much about this tree is the carpet/fur/blue stuff, which is really thin and doesn't really provide any padding. Though the cats don't care about this when they're taking a nap, it gets annoying when they're playing around on it. Because it's so thin, their nails can't really get a good grip, meaning that when they're racing around the house and jump on the tree they tend to just slide right off again. Still, for the price this is a very good tree, and easy to put together as well.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer1560

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy, tall well built cat tree
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, tall well built cat tree! Would highly recommend. I gave 4 stars because 1 of the mice came off after only 5 days of having the tree so I'm a bit disappointed in that as the mice were the main reason we picked this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie L Winchester

product_meta.title: Go Pet Club Cat Tree
product_meta.description: Color:BlueColor: Blue. Overall Size : 50"W x 26"L x 72"H. Base Board Size : 28"W x 24"L. Size of Condo 1 : 20"W x 15"L x 11.5"H. Size of Condo 2 : 15"W x 12"L x 10"H. Top 3 Perches : 13.5"W x 13.5"L x 2.5"H. Number of Posts: 10. Number of Levels: 15. Posts covered by natural sisal rope. Covering Material: Faux Fur. Board Material: Wood. Easy to assemble with step by step instruction and tools included.Basket- 12 inches Diameter.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
